title: Blessings of the Priesthood in Every Home: The Example of a Righteous Woman
short_title: Blessings of the Priesthood in Every Home: The Example of a Righteous Woman
content: Blessings of the Priesthood in Every Home: The Example of a Righteous Woman
The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
(1 of 2) Elder Ballard, Elder Rasband, Bishop Stevenson, Sister Wixom, Sister Burton, and Sister Dalton share an example of the power and influence a mother can have in the home.
